name: Wildcard Willies *
description:
Guess what's behind  the *** € wildcard for each item. Can you beat your personal Lars!

Fan game based on the amazing RBTV show "Pfiffige Ziffern". 

Do you know how much a Budi-Kopf costs? Test you knowledge here against the Larses.

Mephisto17Games

Rico (reengoo) & Olli (l1nk86)
